scene.start:
v0.4.21

Use the @{{bot_username}} bot as your regular cryptocurrency wallet. The wallet is linked to your Telegram account.

Buy, send, receive, and exchange cryptocurrencies

dashboard.start:
🤖🔥

Hey, {{first_name}}!
Here you can monitor the statistics and customize the bot.

wallet.select:
⬇️ Deposit

What cryptocurrency do you want to deposit into your wallet?
wallet.hint:
⬇️ Deposit

Use the address below to send {{wallet_symbol}} to the bot wallet. Funds will be credited within 30-60 minutes

withdraw.amount:
⬆️ Withdraw

How much {{wallet_symbol}} you want to withdraw?
withdraw.address:
⬆️ Withdraw

Type the address where you want to withdraw the money. Funds will be withdrawn within 30-60 minutes.

wallet.select:
⬆️ Withdraw

Select a wallet from which you want to withdraw.

withdraw.fulfilled:
⬆️ Withdraw

Withdrawal Request #12345 has been fulfilled!
